mapper.select: SELECT c.CART_ID cart_id,m.M_ID id,c.B_NO boardnum, PERSON person, ADDDATE addDate, PRICE price,renamedFileName from CART c LEFT JOIN MEMBER m on m.M_ID = c.CART_ID AND c.M_ID = m.M_ID left join ACTI_BOARD a on c.B_NO = a.B_NO where c.B_NO = a.B_NO;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART( M_ID, B_NO, CART_ID, PERSON, ADDDATE, PRICE ) VALUES( #{id}, #{boardnum}, #{cart_id}, #{person}, #{addDate}, #{price} )
